name: Life Sucks And You're A Bird
name_original: Life Sucks And You're A Bird
description:
A brooding meta-narrative experiment in player experience. Part 1 of a grand epic that will likely never be continued. Controller required.

Made by JohnLee Cooper, Aaron Sutton, Jesse Baker, Justin Capcap, and Matt Murch. Yes, it took that many of us to make it.
